column3: IOE, UCL’s Faculty of Education and Society
column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLOffered jointly by IOE, UCL’s Faculty of Education and Society and Birkbeck, the Educational Neuroscience MA/MSc will introduce students to the methods and findings from the emerging field of educational neuroscience. It will develop their understanding of key issues in educational neuroscience and the application of neuroscience to education, and provide the opportunity for them to undertake research in educational neuroscience.
column7: Register your interest in graduate study at UCL
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
